name: Fabulous Beasts BR
description: This is the Brazilian community for You Shou Yan. Here you can interact with fans of the animated series and manhua, share your passion for the work, and meet new people.

name: ≈åkami
description:
We started as a discord mainly for the r/Okami subreddit and we also share main staff. It's grown over time to be one of the largest Okami servers!
We also link to other Okami servers, Okami communities on other sites, Okami-like games, and more on our resources page.

name: Aetherium Station
description: This is my personal Discord server where I chat with friends and followers. It's a cozy place to hang out, share memes, and talk about art, programming, music, and pretty much anything.

name: Fabulous Beasts ES
description: This is the Spanish YSY server. Here you can talk about Fabulous Beasts in Spanish. It's a great place to connect with other fans who speak the language.

name: Library of Beasts
description: A Fabulous Beasts & Project Moon focused community server! Literally an amalgamation of Project Moon sleeper agents and Fabulous Beasts enjoyers, lol. Chill community tho!
